name: image2beercaps
description: Convert images to beercap mosaic instructions

scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release -Z build-std=std,panic_abort && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hungarian_wasm.wasm --out-dir pkg --target web --typescript && sed -i "s|import('../../..')|import('../../../hungarian_wasm.js')|g" pkg/snippets/wasm-bindgen-rayon-*/src/workerHelpers.js
